name: Run Away (itch) (Livine Sigier, FlorianAsencio)
description:
Run Away

Run Away is a narrative game with an atmosphere of horror that is adapted according to the player typology.

Embody Rosa's and investigate the disappearance of her sister, Elena in an abandoned manor near the town who is named Midnight Valley.

This game is only dubbing in french. Run Away required a good configuration.

Gamepad Controls :

The project was made by a team of 2 students and the help of 5 external people for dubbing and music :

- Asencio Florian : Narrative & Level Designer ; Programmer ; Sound Designer

- Sigier Livine : Art Director & Environment Artist - artstation.com/livinesigier

- Asencio Léa : Rosa Cruz's voice 

- Laraki Eva : Elena Cruz's voice 

- Wierre Lorenzo : Horacio Kefpler's voice 

- Galaxia : Composer - soundcloud.com/galaxia-beats

- Warot Quentin : Composer
